name: oarc-mod
title: OARC Scenario
author: Oarcinae
description:
This mod provides a scenario that overhauls multiplayer spawning.
[color=red][font=default-bold]You do not need this mod to play the scenario![/font][/color]
This is just a way to serve the scenario files over the mod portal. The recommended way to get this scenario is to download it from the github source. I don't do a good job of maintaining the mod version... View the scenario in the scenario menu for further information.
